post.body: lulz
Yay! We love ours, it's so much fun :)
woo welcome home! <3
Happy New Year! Got the DVD yesterday, wooo - thank you for making it :D
I set everything out for her last night, list, cards, etc and she did half of them this morning, so cute! She did a great job :)
Mine keeps putting it off. /sigh She's so pooped.
Merry Christmas! xoxoxo <3
lol, grody! Are you stranded from irc? It's on ...
I'll text you - have a safe trip! xoxo
@jeoncs @rocklobsterguy @habanero shamwow!
Yes, I'm rather impressed with your geekiness and philanthropy. I might have to start watching Heroes. (I miss Alias!)
took K to the http://www.dwplightfestival.com/index.htm - did the shuttle thing and she didn't get overly tired, yay!
almost done with visits.....so tired.
listening to Smokie charge into a pile of wrapping paper.
It was the magical Christmas Truck! http://www.christmascaroling.org/
Just watched a choir on a fire engine go down the Blvd singing http://tinyurl.com/9256zo - epic.
Happy Hanukkah! http://www.flickr.com/photos/lightofmydark/3126369465/
Ignoring my holiday to do list by working on my WoW holiday achievement list, lol.
Now, if only Hugh Laurie would Twitter, it would be a party...
deciding which Christmas songs to infuse into my child's holiday memories =)
